item.title: RT by @IsraelMFA: Honored to welcome again my dear friend India's External Affairs Minister @DrSJais...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @IsraelMFA

RT by @IsraelMFA: Honored to welcome again my dear friend India's External Affairs Minister @DrSJaishankar back to Israel, during the historic second visit of PM @narendramodi. We held a wide-ranging discussion on geopolitical developments and the implementation of the joint working plan for our bilateral relations in 2026. We will continue tomorrow. This a special strategic relationship and together we're taking it to the next level! ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³

item.title: RT by @IsraelMFA: Latvia strongly supports the UNâ€™s human rights pillar, including the independence ...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @IsraelMFA

RT by @IsraelMFA: Latvia strongly supports the UNâ€™s human rights pillar, including the independence and integrity of the UN Special Procedures system. At the same time, several positions taken by Special Rapporteur Francesca Albanese raise serious concern. We call to avoid rhetoric that undermines the constructive and balanced engagement that is essential to the credibility of the UN human rights framework. Failing this, the mandate cannot be carried out. @LatviaUN_NY | @UN | @LatviaUN_Gene
